pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.1: Of the four fallings away how many fallings away do the offences for one indulging in sexual intercourse appertain to?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.2: Of the four fallings away the offences for indulging in sexual intercourse appertain to two fallings away:
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.3: there may be falling away from moral habit; there may be falling away from good behaviour â€¦
pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.1: Of the four fallings away how many fallings away does the offence of easing oneself or spitting in water out of disrespect appertain to?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.2: Of the four fallings away the offence of easing oneself or spitting in water out of disrespect appertains to one falling away:
pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.3: the falling away from good behaviour.
pli-tv-pvr1.3:3.1: Concluded is the Third Chapter: that on Falling Away
